content.raw:
How does this interact with [labscript installer pull request 6](#!/labscript_suite/installer/pull-requests/6/make-shortcuts-compatible-with-conda/)? I’m mainly wondering if the app id’s need to also be virtual environment specific?

I guess that’s not necessarily strictly part of this pull request, but doing that would make it easy to test this pull request, as we would be certain there weren’t weird windows caching effects going on \(since each labscript install would have a unique app id\)
content.html:
How does this interact with labscript installer pull request 6? I’m mainly wondering if the app id’s need to also be virtual environment specific?

I guess that’s not necessarily strictly part of this pull request, but doing that would make it easy to test this pull request, as we would be certain there weren’t weird windows caching effects going on (since each labscript install would have a unique app id)
